text: Nostradamus decoded the young lion shall
overcome the old one on the field of war
in a single combat the quatrain
underscored his fame by a prediction
that seemed to come true it happened in
the summer of 1559 the King of France
hosts the wedding's of both his daughter
and his sister so there was a giant
tournament to celebrate the two
marriages and at this tournament henry
ii decided that he wanted to show off
his prowess as a warrior so he
challenged to single combat the count of
montgomery was a famous warrior at the
time
Ian Montgomery fighted jousts with
blunted Lance's but Montgomery's Lance
breaks and the point of Montgomery's
broken Lance goes into the ice slit of
Henry the seconds helmet and penetrates
his eye ten days later after unspeakable
agony
Henry does everyone even Montgomery
whose misfortune it was to have killed
the King credited Nostradamus with
having predicted it though the wording

will put out his eyes in a cage of gold
two fleets one then he dies a cruel
death this prophecy is filled with
interesting circumstantial or literal

the old lion in the first line they both
it is said had lion embossed shields the

King young lion old lion though Henry's

could the jousting arena be called a
feel
war if you interpret on a field war to
indicate that the two huge armies and
that these are the heroes going out
before to do single combat then it
